refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the type of interface between web server and PHP

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: php_sapi_name returns a lowercase string which describes the type of interface between web server and PHP (Server API, SAPI). In CGI PHP, this string is "cgi", in mod_php for Apache, this string is "apache" and so on.
